body:
Well just like the most people, I'm leaving avicus for a while.

I really don't know what to say, Avicus have been my favorite server for a while now but it's kinda sad too see how poorly it is being made. The maps are just all horrible, and yes I'm obviously talking about the final, but all other maps aswell.
 The commands and just overall server is like ocn was back 3 years ago.
I'll stay around the forums, for the memes and lols, but ingame, nah.

But you know, I'll be back, one day..

Thanks to Bmb, tazz, BC, Jozz, Some kool staff members and shit.

But I'm honestly not going to play on such a poor server anymore. Sorry.

title: Woah man

replies.body:
robin ur ez. jk i love you so much u taught me a lot in defences and in that final match we were both messaging each other saying how we both love each other and do your best


don't feel so downed about yourself buddy because u got pressurised so fucking much. no defender could've survived that so gg and well played :)

i love you once again bud
